author: BuXXe (@dieBuXXe)
title: kinox.to
synopsis: Movian plugin to watch kinox.to streams
description: kinox.to Movian plugin allows the integration of kinox.to streams into Movian. kinox.to offers stream for movies and series (mostly german and english). If you encounter problems, leave a note at the github. Visit at: https://github.com/BuXXe/movian-kinox-plugin
